title: 'A great night saver on heavy flow days'
body: The best night pad I've ever used, I've heavy flow on my 1st and 2nd day and it saved me.. There's no leakage or stain and rashes what so ever, love this product üíñ

title: 'does not absorb and leaks on panty'
body: 'it is soft and comfortable but it is too long it does not absorb well and it leaks on the panty which means through the plastic sheet also it leaks down. and way tooo expensive i paid 250 + for just 10 worthless pads.'

title: Doesn't absorb well.
body: Soft and easy to use. BUT , doesn't absorb well. Not good for first 2 days of menstruation. Whisper other product are way better for absorption.

title: 'Good for 2nd day flow also'
body: 'Not just for night time but also even during heavy flow day the pad can be used. It is good'

title: 'Soft with poor absorption
body: '2.0 out of 5 stars''The extended part does not have the pad in it just the plastic covering is extended towards the tail end of the napkin- just like sticky wings but not absorption material. It is quite useless during heavy bleeding. Sale gimmick with zero actual improvement over usual xl pads.'

title: 'Truly amazing!!'
body: 'These are the best whisper products I have used so far. Can the company give the kola soft sanitary napkins in 50 counts?'

title: 'Not good'
body: 'Not good. Unnessassarily long. Leaks over from sides. Pad Must be thicker rather than longer. Useless product.'

title: Absorption is poor so it doesn't work.
body: Absorption is poor so it doesn't work. Disappointed.. whisper regular pads are better than this. Whisper may add products eco-friendly at this cost.

title: 'So soft and secure!'
body: It's super duper soft and has two pairs of stick able wings!!And the packaging is so damn cute. I love how the pads are covered in cute koala outer packaging. I am all for utility but I have a soft spot for cute things. This is going to be my regular purchase along with whisper pink packet. Now I just need a cottony soft varient for days with less flow (I use stayfree now but would like to switch to whisper as it's softer (
